subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: After being left off the World Cup roster this summer, Landon Donovan put aside tension with the U.S. men’s national team and played the final game of his 15-year international career, a friendly match against Ecuador.
snippet: After being left off the World Cup roster this summer, Landon Donovan put aside tension with the U.S. men’s national team and played the final game of his 15-year international career, a friendly match against Ecuador.
